name: Dimense: Chapter 1
description: The game is a first person survival horror games, where the player is required to complete tasks/mission in order to beat the game. Players will need to avoid enemy detection, and explore the environment for clues and objectives of the game. Players will also need  to use their running and hiding ability to keep themselves safe while simultaneously ensuring that their trusted flashlight is fully charged with battery to allow them to navigate through the darkness.
